author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2280 - Support path restriction in IndexPlanner
Make usage of path restrictions conditional via index config. Mostly enabled for getting existing testcase passed as it would not perform well for large index size as per current implementation.
So this feature should be considered experimental

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2278 - Same Lucene index to support both property restrictions and fulltext constraints (WIP)
Getting the test to pass with LucenePropertyIndex by also checking if a PropertyDefinition is enabled for indexing in planner

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2279 -  Add testMode support in IndexPlanner

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2278 - Same Lucene index to support both property restrictions and fulltext constraints
Disable 'luceneGlobal' index definition as this causes two fulltext index to get activated at same time.
